title: hello, foreign friends who are browsing LIHKG

replies.msg:
wondering why some of us use "Trump Trump" instead of "Trump" to address Mr Trump the president of the USA?

it's because "Trump Trump" sounds more close and friendly as it's in the Cantonese culture that some of us like to use two consecutive words from the first name to address our loved ones.

feel free to drop your questions here.

about my user name 黎子蜂

黎: Lai, a common family name
子: Chi, child
蜂: Fung, bee

replies.msg:
hey, my friend, welcome to LIHKG!

here is the meaning of each character in the nickname:
老: Lo, old
帽: Mo, hat
脫: Tut, to drop
毒: Dook, toxin / toxic / poison / poisonous
中: Zung, middle

frankly i don't see the meaning of "handsome boy"
but rather "an old hat which is under going a detoxication process"

To Foreign friends:

We want more reliable source of information like that so that we can know more about US!
